00022 #ifndef B13CURVE_H
00023 #define B13CURVE_H
00024 
00025 #include "common.h"
00026 #include <stdexcept>
00027 #include "units.h"
00028 #include "zeroin.h"
00029 #include "steamcalculator.h"
00030 #include "steamproperty.h"
00031 #include "solver.h"

00033 #include <iostream>

00046 template<class Ordinate,class Abscissa,int OrdinateAlt=0, int AbscissaAlt=0>
00047 class B13CurveBase{
00048 
00049         public:
00050 
00051                 virtual Ordinate solve(const Abscissa &target) = 0;
00052 
00053         protected:
00054 
00055                 B13CurveBase(){}
00056                 virtual ~B13CurveBase(){}
00057 
00058                 Ordinate getOrdinate(SteamCalculator S){
00059                         return SteamProperty<Ordinate,OrdinateAlt>::get(S);
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 Abscissa getAbscissa(SteamCalculator S){
00063                         return SteamProperty<Abscissa,AbscissaAlt>::get(S);
00064                 }
00065 
00066 };
00067 
00069 
00072 template<class Ordinate,class Abscissa,int OrdinateAlt=0, int AbscissaAlt=0>
00073 class B13Curve : public B13CurveBase<Ordinate,Abscissa,OrdinateAlt,AbscissaAlt>{
00074 
00075         public:
00076 
00077                 Ordinate solve(const Abscissa &target){
00078 
00079                         try{
00080                                 Abscissa maxerr = target * 1e-12;
00081 
00082                                 Solver<Temperature,Abscissa,Pressure> PS1(T_REG1_REG3,target);
00083                                 SteamCalculator S = PS1.solve(maxerr, 0.001 * Pascal);
00084 
00085                                 //cout << S.pres() << endl;
00086 
00087                                 return B13CurveBase<Ordinate,Abscissa,OrdinateAlt,AbscissaAlt>::getOrdinate(S);
00088 
00089                         }catch(std::exception &e){
00090                                 std::stringstream s;
00091                                 s << "B13Curve<" << SteamProperty<Ordinate,OrdinateAlt>::name() << "," << SteamProperty<Abscissa,AbscissaAlt>::name() << ">::solve(" << SteamProperty<Abscissa,AbscissaAlt>::name() << " = " << target <<"): " << e.what();
00092                                 throw std::runtime_error(s.str());
00093                         }
00094                 }
00095 };
00096 
00098 
00101 template<class Ordinate,int OrdinateAlt>
00102 class B13Curve<Ordinate,Pressure,OrdinateAlt,0>
00103         : public B13CurveBase<Ordinate,Pressure,OrdinateAlt,0>{
00104 
00105         public:
00106 
00107                 B13Curve() : B13CurveBase<Ordinate,Pressure,OrdinateAlt,0>(){}
00108 
00109                 virtual Ordinate solve(const Pressure &p){
00110                         SteamCalculator S;
00111                         S.set_pT(p,T_REG1_REG3,0);
00112                         return B13CurveBase<Ordinate,Pressure,OrdinateAlt,0>::getOrdinate(S);
00113                 }
00114 };
